alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 8:13PM EST until February 26 at 4:19AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Muskingum River At Beverly affecting Washington County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Muskingum River At Beverly. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Low areas, and farmland, camps, and a few homes are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 29.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM EST Friday was 29.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to fall, going below flood stage late Friday night. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 29.3 feet on 02/21/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 430 AM EST.
